p.d: Alma, Solana and Caroline help Noémie and Alexis to escape to Rodolphe's place in Paris. At the same time, Alma leaves the Duparcq law firm. Solana wants to expand the print-works and seeks a bank loan for a new machine. Caroline has got her first contract as a home-based seamstress. She tells her friends she fell in love with a young photographer in Tangiers who is currently working at Denain. Solana understands that she's talking about Fadi, wanted by the police since his picture appeared in the newspapers. Directed by: Gabriel Aghion (season 2, France, 2017) Screenplay: Dan Franck, Stéphane Osmont Cast: Alma Jodorowsky (Solana), Lilly-Fleur Pointeaux (Caroline), Stéphane Caillard (Alma), Sabine Haudepin (Micheline), Corentin Fila (Fadi), Claire Nebout (Valérie), Jérôme Anger (Vilson), Vladimir Consigny (Rodolphe), Bruno Todeschini (Duparcq), Jean Gardeil (Didier), Jean-Claude Adelin (Roger), Jean-Yves Berteloot (Mercier), Nicolas Bridet (Vildé) Genre: comedy drama
